Digital Video Innovation

Real-time Graphics & Visual Technology

Exploring the frontiers of digital video art and technology. Real-time 3D graphics meet projection mapping and live video mixing to create immersive visual experiences that blend the digital and physical worlds.

Realtime

Generative 3D audio-visual experiences using TouchDesigner and Unreal Engine

TouchDesigner • Unreal Engine • Interactive

Mapping

3D projection mapping on custom-printed objects and architectural surfaces

Projection • 3D Objects • Architecture

Mixing

Live video mixing and real-time visual performance systems

Live Performance • VJ Sets • Real-time

Editing

Post-production workflows and cinematic video editing techniques

Post-production • Cinematic • Workflows

The Waveform Generation
